lines: 1. Seeking the lost-Yes kindly entreating Wanderers on the Mountain astray; Come unto me, His message repeating, Words of the Master speaking today.
Refrain : Going afar Upon the mountain, Bringing the wand'rer back again, Into the fold of my Redeemer, Jesus the Lamb for sinners slain.
2. Seeking the lost-And pointing to Jesus Souls that are weak And hearts that are sore, Leading them forth in ways of salvation, Pointing the lost to life evermore.
3. Thus I would go on missions of mercy, Following Christ from Day unto day, Cheering the faint And raising the fallen, Pointing the lost to Jesus, the Way.
